name: Dream Catcher (itch) (Crucial Games)
description:
This game was created for CAS Game Jam and contains some bugs.

Story:

Dream catcher is a game where you have to save a city from nightmares. The longer you take, the more creatures from the nightmares appear and try to kill you. You have to run to people's houses to free them from nightmares.

Functionality:

  1. To clean houses from nightmares you have to run into the black circle that is around the house. 
  2. With each house your karma increases, but it also decreases every ten seconds.
  3. If you have no more karma, or if you touch a monster, you lose.
  4. You can only kill the monsters with an ultra attack. 
  5. You can recharge it by collecting ten emeralds that spawn at certain spots.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or your controller.
  • Run: Shift (keyboard) or RT (xbox)
  • Ultra Attack: C (keyboard) or X (xbox) (your stamina needs to be full)

Known Issues:

  • Lower scores are overwriting the highscore
